text: 15.15 Jon 17.26, Apo 20.27 Bɨ wog gɨñeb okok, kɨli bɨawl kod mɨdep kɨli ak, geb ak gɨnɨgab ak agɨl, ma nepal agak. Yad pen anɨgɨl ma gebin agak. Bapi takaw tɨtay mɨdupsek yɨp agñub okok, nɨbop agñɨbin agak. Ak nɨm mɨñɨl tɨkɨl, nɨbop bɨ wog gɨñeb yad mɨdebɨm ma agebin, bogɨlak tep yad mɨdebɨm agebin agak.
